comment.authorname: Roma ieri, Roma oggi di Alvaro de Alvariis

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
This is Sea Bright, New Jersey -- NOT Nova Scotia. Sea Bright is a borough of Monmouth County, New Jersey. The worst storms ever to hit Sea Bright (spelled as two words -- nowadays, anyhow) struck on December 26, 1913, and about a week later, on January 3, 4, and 5, 1914. This photo was taken on the 6th of January.

Other Bain/LOC photos of wreckage after the Sea Bright storms:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4690136561/in/set-72157603624867509/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4690770892/]

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4690774896/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for the information, Wystan. We'll make the changes to the group of records the next time we update them.
